Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Gen AI provides me with better examples, and I am able to ask as many questions I have to clarify my doubts. Unlike, with a teacher I have limited time limit considering a teacher has to attend to other students as well.

Question 41.Response: I feel I understand better with a feedback provided by Gen AI
